name: CopyEntityFrameworkMigrate
description: Copy migrate.exe from the Entity Framework nuget package to the specified output folder
author: Tobania
helpMarkDown: Copy migrate.exe from the Entity Framework nuget package to the specified output folder

inputs.name: PackagesConfig
inputs.label: NuGet packages.config
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path of the packages.config file from the .NET project that contains the EntityFramework migrations

inputs.name: PackagesFolder
inputs.label: NuGet packages folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory in which the source files are kept. Used to determine the location of migrate.exe

inputs.name: EFPackageName
inputs.label: EntityFramework Package Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The id of the Entity Framework NuGet package

inputs.name: OutputDirectory
inputs.label: Output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory in which migrate.exe will be copied. It is NOT recommended to use the bin folder of a project. Migrate.exe will be copied into the correct folder during the release
